span.span: Generates a bootstrapper for ClickOnce deployment projects.

summary.span: 获取或设置在目标计算机上安装组件时，该组件是否使用提升的权限运行。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a component runs with elevated permissions when it is installed on a target computer.

value.span: 如果使用提升的权限运行已安装的组件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the installed component runs with elevated permissions; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可在项目文件中设置，但不会在 MSBuild 架构中公开。This property can be set in the project file, but it is not exposed in the MSBuild schema. 在项目文件的 `MsiBootstrapper` 部分中，将 [RequiresElevation 属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/bb384030(v=vs.100)) 设置为 `True` 。In the project file's `MsiBootstrapper` section, set the [RequiresElevation Property](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/bb384030(v=vs.100)) to `True`. 当组件写入注册表项或正在安装到 GAC 时，组件以提升的权限运行。A component runs with elevated permissions when it writes a registry key or is being installed to the GAC. 例如，如果要将程序集安装到 GAC，则需要将此属性设置为 `True` 。For example, if you are installing assemblies to the GAC, you need to set this property to `True`.

span.span: RequiresElevation Property

summary.span: 获取或设置一个位置，以供引导程序查找要安装的安装必备组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

value.span: 供引导程序查找要安装的安装必备组件的位置。

span.span: The location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以具有以下值：This property can have the following values:: - `HomeSite`：指示必备组件正由组件供应商联系托管。`HomeSite`: Indicates that the prerequisite is being hosted by the component vendor. - `Relative`：指示必备组件位于应用程序的同一位置。`Relative`: Indicates that the preqrequisite is at the same location of the application. - `Absolute`：指示所有组件在集中式 URL 处找到。`Absolute`: Indicates that all components are to be found at a centralized URL. 应将此值与属性结合使用 `ComponentsUrl` 。This value should be used in conjunction with the `ComponentsUrl` property. 如果未指定 ，则默认情况下使用 `HomeSite`。If is not specified, `HomeSite` is used by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ComponentsUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: if the bootstrapper should copy all output files to the path specified in the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此参数的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this parameter is `true`.
